website_summaries.verdict: A complete inflatable pull-out sofa. One of the best choices if you want a convenient sleeping setup while camping.
pros: Features a simple pull-out design that converts the sofa into a full queen-size bed in just seconds
The sofa inflates as a single piece, saving time and effort during the inflation process
cons: Larger size of the sofa requires extra space outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Developed holes the second day
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this item. The first day it was great, easy to inflate since I already had a pump, and felt as expected. However it developed a hole the second day. I went out and got a patch kit for an easy fix. That solved the problem until it got another hole 3 days later. It now has 5 small holes that render it completely useless. Each time i fix one hole it develops another almost instantly. Very disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: no, no, just no
customer_reviews.text: 20 yr old son thought this was great for watching tv, but air channels became unglued from the inside quickly in both levels of the seat part, so it no longer had a long couch look but a circle. It no longer folded right and had to be held down and you had to climb to get it to be sat on, so it was in the trash before 2 months. Don't get this, they haven't perfected the channels and you'll be unhappy very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT customer service
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT customer service. We received one defective one where some of the chambers were deflating. They sent me a replacement right away. I had bought 2, and the one that wasn't defective was super comfy and the envy of the campground (we used it out camping while at a lake). We used it to sit on during the day, and at night as a bed for the kids in the tent. Huge hit all around.
customer_reviews.author: mcdavis

customer_reviews.title: Comfotable and light
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Comfortable both as a sofa and as a bed. And not heavy when I have to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the air it is very durable and it also comfortable u dont even need to refill it every day ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for months already it does not leak the air it is very durable and it also comfortable u dont even need to refill it every day i am 163cm and weight 55kg so its not a problem
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping around for these for a few months. This is definitely a good deal for this mattress/couch. We used a small portable vacuum to blow it up quickly. One thing I would note, put a mattress topper on. This helps to smooth out the dips/valleys in the mattress so it's a bit flatter. That aside, this is a great option for camping to help reduce space in when you don't need it for sleeping. It comfortably fits 3 people on the couch set up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Alcaro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Have had this since July with very light use and it already has a hole in the back part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dorm Life
customer_reviews.text: This couch is great! It inflated quickly and easily. It's quite comfy too. It's great for college as it fits perfectly under a lofted bed and can easily be turned into a queen sized bed. Once blown up, the ports are easy to access to refill it. It's lightweight and can easily be stored in the summer. The material is a bit fuzzy, so you don't stick to it. The built in cup-holders are a plus too, they grip your drink a bit so it's harder to spill it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy J Scott

customer_reviews.title: When quality control issues are resolved, this will be a good value
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a 2-inch slice (5cm for the heathens), in one panel. It was kind of usable with pillows. If the quality control issues were dealt with, this might be a really great buy. We dealt with customer service directly to resolve issues. They were really great, and aware of the problems. I understood that the potential for manufacturing defects was high, so I adjusted my expectations here.
customer_reviews.author: PaintswithWords

customer_reviews.title: Great option for short-term guest
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to inflate using the Intex inflater that I also purchased, I would not recommend trying to manually pump this it'd almost be impossible. Very easy to convert into a bed, and comfortable as a couch. Love the cupholders. This would be a great cheap option for a temporary guest. My only drawback is that the couch does leak air. It's been almost a month that I've been using it so I no longer think it's simply just the material stretching, pretty sure it leaks somewhere. That having been said it's not major, I can still use the couch and just top it up with a bit of air every other day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Vida

customer_reviews.title: It came quick but when it filled with air it ...
customer_reviews.text: It came quick but when it filled with air it had leakes it’s going back to wherever it came from.,
customer_reviews.author: Al Dawgg

customer_reviews.title: Might last you a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I can never get this filled up enough for it to be comfortable to sit on even with an electric pump. It's served its purpose while we are waiting for a Furniture to be delivered but I have to say it almost immediately started deflating and it ended up in the garbage a week later. My Hope was that we could use this for guest as needed but it just isn't a quality inflatable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Seams rip if you sit on it... even though its a couch and you're supposed to sit on it...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the couch about a month ago. While yes, it does need to be refilled on occasion and it can leak from being used, it was useful and functional. However, one of the seams of the portion you would sit on in the couch set-up ripped and popped upwards, making the bed incapable of use and sitting on as a couch incredibly uncomfortable / not really function at all. I wouldn't buy again, and I wouldn't suggest to anyone who intends to use the couch as anything long term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe around cats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased first one and as soon as my cat jumped on it there was an instant hole, then I purchased a second one and cut my cat once again jumped on it and it has another hole. Point of the story you get what you pay for and if make a suggestion to make it more durable for people with animals even it’s a temporary fix. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tusabi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping
customer_reviews.text: I went camping and my tent was the Hang Spot because of this couch. It did loose some air from 3 Men sitting on it, but I never checked to make sure all the threads and caps were screwed in tight. There are approximately 5 places to fill up the air. It took about 6 mins to fully inflate. I had no idea it had Cup Holders which came in handy. Very Comfy couch-folded or unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work and always try to find the cheapest way to furnish my apartments. This couch has worked great. After you sit on it the first time it will stretch but you just need to air it up a bit more, it’s not leaking. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Died after a couple months of useage
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable couches anyway but it's inflatable so I didn't expect it to be. Bought for a temporary couch for a kid or two to sit on while playing video games. Lasted about 90 days. First, it developed a small pin hole in one of the arms. Before I had a chance to fix it, one of the air chambers open up into the adjoining chamber making a big hump in the middle of the couch. Checked warranty and found there was none. 4 months after purchase and its ready for the trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Music

customer_reviews.title: Great Value !
customer_reviews.text: Sofa is HUGE. Did not expect it to be so big. Durable, but as instructed, must be pumped daily, for the first week of setup. It stretches over time. It does the trick !
customer_reviews.author: ridim007

customer_reviews.title: Responds fast, really helped us out
customer_reviews.text: We loved this futon very much in our dorm. Then, it popped out and was really defective almost immediately after blowing it up. One email to the company, and they sent us a new one. Really helpful and prompt response considering the circumstances. The new one is great and we all love sitting on it. Great for dorms!!! THANK YOU INTEX!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Cumberland

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold air very well. The fold down section ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold air very well. The fold down section was detaching from the couch section. Found out it was popped. Only used twice.
customer_reviews.author: William R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it... Fees like comfortable, feels very stron, easy to blow up, no assembly needed. Will put durability to the test when I go on vacation & will write another review then.
customer_reviews.author: Shannel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had this product for 20 days and one chamber doesn’t even hold air rendering useless and the last chamber the seems ripped on the inside forming a bubble. This company obviously doesn’t know what their doing. I would not suggest this product
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT!!!!!!!!! DONT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY OR YOUR TIME! Im kicking myself for not listening to the reviews. I just inflated it so there is absolutely NO way it was popped by anyone in my house and it goes flat almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's not a couch, but it'll do I guess
customer_reviews.text: Fills okay, each section has to be inflated individually though. Doesn't hold air for very long, I have to refill it maybe twice a week if I use it every day. It's only comfortable to sit on with another person on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for adolescents and not for adults. Middle cushion Went flat overnight. I received a defective item. I didn’t receive a full refund as the shipping charges were taken out of my refund. I have Amazon prime and this was not a successful buy. I will not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: it's super comfortable and perfect for sleepovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's room and it is gorgeous! Not only is the fabric soft and it is true to color, it's super comfortable and perfect for sleepovers. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana A. Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: It broke at the seams
customer_reviews.text: This futon popped at the seams! The dents on the couch portion popped and a hole formed in the actual backrest so we have used it as a folded matress. It is REALLY comfy and when all pieces are functional it is a good purchase; however, there are some manufacturing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you weigh 190 pounds don't buy this thing.
customer_reviews.text: 36 days. That's how long this sofa lasted before a rib burst. And, as you can see, it's impossible to use as a seat now. I don't think it's unreasonable of me to be pissed about this. I will admit it was comfortable for the 5 weeks it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Neil Reed

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Couch
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a game room for grandkids and its worked out great! Once you figure out and adjust the air level it’s quite comfortable! Will be purchasing a second one in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I thought it was a good idea, it's not a bad couch, it's nice, decent cupholders. However, there is already a hole and it's very hard to patch. I've had to fill it up every few hours. Not to mention the fact that it has a very bad plastic/latex odor. I've had it for almost a week and it still smells bad, I've sprayed it with air freshener and still it smells very chemically. Besides the duribilty and the smell, it's not that bad, it's kind of uncomfortable when blown all the way up, but the pull out part is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It Worked Great for the Occasion
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when extra company came in. The kids really liked it and said it was comfortable to sit on. It is not really for older adults of course but it worked great for the occasion. Standard queen size sheets fits it nicely. Was great for toddler as well.
customer_reviews.author: JHeck

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable Couch
customer_reviews.text: It's very large my kids love to lounge and watch there tv shows on it. It was easy to blow up and once it was up I seen how durable it is and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SheTheBest

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not gonna remain stationary and fixed to the ground when you sit, lie and roll on it because it's flexible and filled with air, might be uncomfortable for some people but not a big complain from me. The material doesn't feel smooth on touch, adding a blanket on it solves the issue. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Ku

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, however the air does not stay in the couch area. The mattress part is good. I’m going to return it and get another, keeping fingers crossed that one is better
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this for about 2 months. It is the BEST air mattress ever. I had it on the sofa setting and it was amazing. I hated giving it uo.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: had to return
customer_reviews.text: it would not maintain pressure, had a slow leak, MFG was great and hepful
customer_reviews.author: roy suarez

customer_reviews.title: Looove this
customer_reviews.text: We took this to a music festival. Used the bed at night and the couch during the day. Fantastic purchase! The first couple of uses the fabric is still stretching so you’ll need to pump a couple times before the fabric settles.
customer_reviews.author: gray mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: AMazing couch especially for the price! We used it at a festival for 4 nights and it worked great. We blew it up again after night 2 but it handled everything better than expected. It have 4 adults on it without any issues and was a huge hit! Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Shlump
customer_reviews.text: It can take a considerable amount of wieght and it wont break or go out stays the same size for a whole noght even when I'm sleeping on it (155)
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two young kids to sleep on while camping for 7 days. We did have to air it back up a time or two but that is normal as the material relaxes. I like how it folds up so we had extra space when not in use as well. A win for us and will be using again next year.
customer_reviews.author: jordan kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It last about 1/2 an hour And them we have to re inflate constantly Not worth the 40 bucks
customer_reviews.author: maria arias

customer_reviews.title: nice sofa, good value.
customer_reviews.text: like this product a lot. would like to find an easier way to find slow leaks though.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Might be cool for kids?
customer_reviews.text: Aired up a few times. Doesn't stay aired up. Not comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Started out great, but after about 5 months the back chamber would start to deflate immediately after filling. Soon after, the main chamber sections (pictured) came unglued so it’s basically like sitting on a big balloon and impossible to get comfortable or stable. Should’ve listened to other reviews that said this was an issue. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hentsch

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We were the talk of the campground with this!! It was perfect for sitting around camp as a couch and also our air matress bed to sleep on! Separate air chambers allow you to really customize your comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Rhonda Osowski

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY AND AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy!! Best air mattress I've bought in a long time! Plus it folds into a couch so it's out of the way and guest can have someone extra to sit, all our guests who stay the night LOVE staying on this!
customer_reviews.author: courtney frey

customer_reviews.title: Intex products are great
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Intex couch. I find them pretty amazing all of there products are easy to inflate and durable.
customer_reviews.author: poppben92

customer_reviews.title: It's a bed and a couch, what else can I say:)
customer_reviews.text: Kids wanted it. No problems with it and they enjoy it. Even thought it was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Heath

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blow up couch/queen air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this Queen size couch/matress. Purchased one for my son's empty apartment so I had something to sit on when visiting. It was pretty comfortable for blow up furniture. I slept on it for 3 nights and my back was fine. I even purchased another one for my front room until our furniture is delivered. It's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Stinebaker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: So far this was actually pretty awesome! Used it in a huge tent and having a couch to gang out on, then pulls out at night for sleeping, well it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Deflates
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first time. Second time it had a hole. Fixed it. It got another hole the next week. Fixed that. And now again today it’s not holding air. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: maralisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It got a hole after only 2 uses!!!! Cheap material
customer_reviews.author: jacob twena

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Seem to last long
customer_reviews.text: It has line indentations that make it a ribbed surface. These lines tend to separate and make a bumble until it's no longer a ribbed bench style surface. Becomes more like a bouncy ball. Took about 6 months to happen from normal wear as a couch.
customer_reviews.author: Nygil Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome..
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome...! I would advice you to use a comforter over it while sleeping for a perfect experience. Also inflate it 90% don't inflate fully if you want a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shri Hari Selvaraj

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Vary cool product, lots of air to inflate, but great. Even comfy as a couch.
customer_reviews.author: Cressey Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for daughter to take on camping trips. She is using it at festivals. Loves it. It is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected and super uncomfy had to send it back and had to pay to send it back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good use
customer_reviews.text: Its of great use when my grand children come to visit, very large enough to hold 5 kids when it folds out to the bed, very comfortable for sitting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Falisier Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great product! ☺
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! It is everything it claimed to be for comfort; easy conversion to sofa, and space-saving convenience. Great buy!😊
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Batiste

customer_reviews.title: Just don't
customer_reviews.text: This thing had a tear within 1 week of purchasing. Ok, no problem... we patched it. From there it was hole after hole and then the seams came undone and the part where you sit is just a giant bubble you can't even sit on it anymore. DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: ✌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I used to my room and its perfect but the only think is i need to inflated every week
customer_reviews.author: Chino Rican

customer_reviews.title: Life Time of the product: 2-3 months at most
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy the product it is really bad, after 2 months of the purchase the seam broke, we contacted VM Express for solution and they mailed me that I have a Intex warranty for my product, I called Intex and they refused saying our product doesn't have any warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mit

customer_reviews.title: Had several holes when I first blew it up
customer_reviews.text: This had several holes when I blew it up for the first time...never has worked correctly...Need to return it still
customer_reviews.author: christy south

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this couch for a month and 2 seams have popped out!! I can’t use it anymore it’s impos to sit on. Air also leaks out tremendously regardless of how tight the cap is and if the cap is on. I would like another one so I can throw this one out! Please!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary furniture...back in closet when finished
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate, comfortable enough. Great temporary furniture for when you’re having over more people than you have seats for.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great extra seating and sleeping when company comes
customer_reviews.text: Pump It Up a couple of times to stretch as instructions state. Seems to be holding air fine. may have to add air every couple of days if using more than short-term. Will work wonderfully when company comes for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: CLCshop

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw this at a friend's house and immediately called me to get one. It's perfect for our basement's seating area, and since we host a lot, its a perfect bed for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina ♡☆♡☆Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I am very displeased and i loved this couch at first
customer_reviews.text: My whole couch broke within a few months of having it. The seams literally popped open. I am very displeased and i loved this couch at first.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Giannelli

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Was nice while I had it. lasted a few months of just lounging watching tv in the evenings before sections stopped holding. Great short term item but dont expect it to last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: ITS AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot bigger than I imagined!! It’s super awesome and it’s actually pretty comfy! Really happy with my purchase. I was going to get the exact one in Walmart for 70$, but looked it up on amazon for only 50$?!?! WHAT A STEAL🤪
customer_reviews.author: Kaylahni Dimdiman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Mostly comfortable. The seat tilts forward a little, but with a covered foam cushion on top, it's really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Stays inflated after first use. Good quality. Cup holders are nice. Great for travel, camping or parties. I travel a lot so it’s practical to move with. Only downside is that when it is fully inflated you tend to be leaving forward because the cushions beneath you don’t stack perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Evan K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you understand what ur buying. If it’s treated well and you’re not throwing 4 heavy dudes at once on it it will last you a while, and it’s super comfy and sleeping on the unfolded position is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: holes
customer_reviews.text: came with a hole in it. i didn’t expect much and i’m just using it for visitors in my dorm but it came with a giant hole and i don’t have the time to return it. super annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a bed/couch like this for over a year until I found this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Analie Valley

customer_reviews.title: Leaked on day 1
customer_reviews.text: Leaked on day 1. Never got to really use it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitebread409

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for a month and it has multiple air leaks and is completely unusable already. I’m beyond disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Simply lovely for the price, we had visitors that loved to sleep in it and it also looks great in our living room
customer_reviews.author: Carol Zilli

customer_reviews.title: Money not well spent
customer_reviews.text: It's an air mattress! It always pops!!! Unfixable! Waste of cash really!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: ... losing air since I got it but I still like
customer_reviews.text: It keeps losing air since I got it but I still like it
customer_reviews.author: Primeguy

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable couch!
customer_reviews.text: We love the inflatable couch. We have used it several times camping and for visiting guests. We have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: S. Steen

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product - Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: "I initially struggled with continuous deflation after fully pumping the item but once i figured out to properly close the knob to the vent, it has been so far so good. Though it is too low for me (when used as a bed), my guest has not complained. It has given value for money.Item came as described by the seller. I am giving 4-Star because i had to buy the pump separately" This is an update to my earlier review; I have changed from 4-Start to 1-Star. Reason: the product started leaking out of the blues because of at least one pin-size hole; this is so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: HomoSapien

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I've had it 3 years now and have never even had to add any more air to it! It's been used as outside seating on my patio since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: SOM

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! We used as our living room couch and easily would sleep two adult guest.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Send a few dollars more and get something better!!
customer_reviews.text: complete garbage I have purchased two! Expect this to las 2-3 months before it leave you on floor in the middle of the night or internal blowout which leave uneven portions of the product.
customer_reviews.author: cclark7733

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget a pump!
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited when I received it, I just didn't realize it didnt come with a pump. Don't make the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome couch
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use it as a couch in my room. It unfolds into a huge mattress. It’s comfy and the only thing I dislike about it is that it kinda deflated faster than expected but it’s not a problem in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: The product was great for a seat in an extra room, until the seams tore apart less than 6 months after purchase and with very light use. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Riddell

customer_reviews.title: the couch was perfect. I will not be ordering another one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second couch and both times they’ve gotten small holes in them and deflated. When there was no holes, the couch was perfect. I will not be ordering another one of these couches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 2nd one is doing better..
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one would not hold air. The 2nd one is doing better.... so far. I have had the replacment for about 2 months so far. I am cautiously optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Culley

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew about this sooner. Using it in our break room. Tears down fast and easy. Stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hair KCMO

customer_reviews.title: hole
customer_reviews.text: Have had it 2 weeks and a hole appeard in the seam and the patch included with the item doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to air up a lot
customer_reviews.text: Seems to lose air fairly quickly. It isn’t completely deflated but within a few hours it’s no longer sturdy/comfortable to be on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than I thought it would be. Using as basement couch and extra sleeping space.
customer_reviews.author: Verena Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: SUCKED. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product SUCKED. I bought it for a music festival. Blew it up and it was completely deflated after two hours. The handling of it during shipping suck too. The box was completely damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with a pump
customer_reviews.text: It's really cool I like it it's super soft and it's really durable but I think it should come with a pump to air it up
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that it converts.
customer_reviews.text: That's comes in great when family comes into town. We use it for extra seating and then stretch it out for the kids to sleep on. I highly recommend getting it.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for price
customer_reviews.text: 13 year olds son is in love with his new room couch! Great for comfort and gaming
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C. Brigman

customer_reviews.title: Great sofa/air bed
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a couch during the day and bed at night it was very comfortable. Held air well. It's very easy to add air when needed. It deflates pretty quickly for storage. Highly recommend!

product_meta.title: Intex 68566VM Inflatable 2 in 1 Pull Out Sofa Couch and Air Mattress Futon, Gray
product_meta.description: Sofa, sleeper, futon, bed, this 2-in-1 pullout is designed for relaxing just about anywhere. The Intex Queen Inflatable Pull-Out Sofa Air Mattress is versatile and goes from an inflatable sofa with cup holders to a queen-size air mattress momentarily. This pull-out, inflatable sofa offers valves with extra-wide openings for fast inflation and deflation (air pump not included). It features waterproof flocked top surfaces that are soft to the touch and tough enough for outdoor use. With a comfortable backrest and armrest for sofa-chilling and a queen air mattress large enough to sleep 2 people, this 2-in-1 design is efficient and convenient for your needs. Watch a movie, take a nap in your tent, or just relax and read a magazine, the Intex Queen Inflatable Pull-Out Sofa Air Mattress is ideal for lounging around or sleeping.
feature_bullets: Versatile pull-out sofa that offers an affordable and comfortable 2-in-1 sleeping solution
Great for watching TV, reading, dorm rooms, guest rooms, and overnight stays
Sofa pulls out into a queen size air mattress large enough to seat or sleep 2 people
High-quality waterproof flocked top and sides are soft to the touch
Air valves feature extra wide openings for speedy inflating and deflating
